Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Entities.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Entities.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Entities.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Entities.UserPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents a user-controlled fighter plane in the game. The plane can move, shoot projectiles, and interact with other game elements.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserPlane

      public UserPlane(int initialHealth)
      Constructs a UserPlane object with specified initial health.
      Parameters:
      initialHealth - The initial health of the plane.

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the plane based on user input. This method is called every frame to keep the plane's movement up to date.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • enforceBounds

      private void enforceBounds()
      Ensures the plane stays within the screen boundaries. If the plane goes outside the screen, its position is reset.

    • updateVerticalMovement

      private void updateVerticalMovement()
      Updates the vertical movement based on user input. The plane accelerates or decelerates depending on user input and the current velocity.

    • updateHorizontalMovement

      private void updateHorizontalMovement()
      Updates the horizontal movement based on user input. The plane accelerates or decelerates depending on user input and the current velocity.

    • applyDeceleration

      private double applyDeceleration(double velocity)
      Applies deceleration to the given velocity. This method is used to gradually slow down movement when no key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      velocity - The current velocity of the plane.
      Returns:
      The new velocity after applying deceleration.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the plane's actor every frame. This method calls updatePosition to keep the plane's movement in sync.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile based on the current gun type. The projectile is fired only if enough time has passed since the last shot (based on the cooldown).
      Returns:
      A list of projectiles fired by the plane.

    • firePistol

      private ActiveActorDestructible firePistol()
      Fires the plane's pistol and returns the projectile created.
      Returns:
      The projectile fired by the plane.

    • fireShotgun

      private List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireShotgun()
      Fires the plane's shotgun and returns the projectiles created. The shotgun fires multiple projectiles at different angles.
      Returns:
      A list of projectiles fired by the plane.

    • fireMinigun

      private List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireMinigun()
      Fires the plane's minigun and returns the projectiles created. The minigun fires multiple projectiles rapidly.
      Returns:
      A list of projectiles fired by the plane.

    • playSound

      private void playSound(String soundFilePath)
      Plays the sound effect for a projectile firing. The sound played depends on the current gun type.
      Parameters:
      soundFilePath - The file path of the sound to play.

    • setGunType

      public void setGunType(UserPlane.GunType gunType)
      Sets the current gun type.
      Parameters:
      gunType - The new gun type.

    • getGunType

      public UserPlane.GunType getGunType()
      Gets the current gun type.
      Returns:
      The current gun type.

    • switchGun

      public void switchGun()
      Switches the plane's gun and updates the display accordingly.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Starts moving the plane left.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Starts moving the plane right.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Starts moving the plane up.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Starts moving the plane down.

    • stopLeft

      public void stopLeft()
      Stops moving the plane left.

    • stopRight

      public void stopRight()
      Stops moving the plane right.

    • stopUp

      public void stopUp()
      Stops moving the plane up.

    • stopDown

      public void stopDown()
      Stops moving the plane down.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops all movement of the plane.

    • getNumberOfKills

      public int getNumberOfKills()
      Gets the current number of kills the plane has achieved.
      Returns:
      The number of kills.

    • incrementKillCount

      public void incrementKillCount()
      Increments the plane's kill count by 1.
